name: Earth Day Live WP
author: Fight For The Future

sections.description:
Earth Day Live

April 22 will be the 50th anniversary of Earth Day.

That’s why we’re launching a massive livestream from April 22-24 where millions of people can tune in with activists, celebrities, musicians, and more in an epic celebration of our planet. Click here to learn more.

How it works & Demo

When you install this plugin and enable the Earth Day Live widget via Settings in your WordPress admin, it will show a footer banner (demo) informing visitors that your site is supporting Earth Day Live and directs them to sign up:

Then at midnight on September 20th for 24 hours, the banner will expand to be full screen (demo), showing that your site is joining Earth Day Live for the day, directing them to join:

For those who cannot shut down their website for the day, a closable overlay option can also be configured (demo):

The widget is designed to appear once per user, per device, per day, but can be configured to display at a different interval.

The widget is compatible with Firefox, Chrome (desktop and mobile), Safari (desktop and mobile), Microsoft Edge, and Internet Explorer 11.

There are a number of ways to customize the widget in the WordPress Settings admin section. It provides details on what each option does.

Note on 3rd party software

This this plugin relies on 3rd party software (https://widget.earthdaylive2020.org/widget.js), in order for your website to join Earth Day Live with the banner. You need to activelty enable the widget via Settings->Earth Day Live Settings, before this script is added to your website.

Please take a look at widget.js if you want to see exactly what you\’re embedding on your page.

This software is maintained by the same team on Github, and you can view its license here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/earth-day-live-wp directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Earth Day Live Settings screen to enable the widget and configure its behaviour
